boardgame.name: Boom Again
boardgame.description:
A pop culture trivia game that takes players on a nostalgic road trip through the memories from the Baby Boom era: from poodle skirts to mini skirts; The Twist to Disco; I Love Lucy to SNL; and hopscotch to protest marches.

How to Play Boom Again
Divide the players into two teams.
Put one token on each center section of the game board.
Pick a category – any category.
Someone from the other team will read you a question.
If you get it right, “tug” the token for that category one step closer to your team’s side of the board.
If the other team chooses the same category, they can “tug” that same token back one space toward their side.
Play tug-of-war trying to pull tokens off the board.
The first team to collect three tokens WINS!

Game Contents
Two card boxes filled with 2,244 questions
6 Boomer tokens:
Metal Skate Key
“Students For Kennedy” Button
45-RPM Record Insert
Vietnam Era Dog Tag
Roach Clip
Milk Bottle Cap

boardgame.name: 探偵稼業 (Detective Life)
boardgame.description:
Detective Life is a card game of information exchange and memory.
Each player, as a detective, try to collect information about six different target. In his/her turn, player exchange cards to collect information. Instead of exchanging information, player can take report action. In the action, the player declares who holds target card in his/her hand. One player can take report action up to three times throughout the game so it is important to exchange information efficiently and to take report action at the right time.

boardgame.name: Praga Caput Regni: reDrewno Insert
boardgame.description: Insert for Praga Caput Regni
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Praga Caput Regni: Wooden Eggs & Promo Cards

boardgame.name: Targi: reDrewno Insert
Tuareg: reDrewno Insert
boardgame.description: Insert for Targi with expansion

boardgame.name: Turn Over
boardgame.description:
In football, champions make the difference!
The club has decided that this will be the turning point, new faces are needed on the pitch and on the bench! The President has left you a nice budget and carte blanche to buy the strongest players, with the certainty that you will do everything to win the Championship (and why not, even the coveted Cup of the Gods).
Turn Over is a solitaire dice and cards game, with a two player variant. Each turn you’ll roll your dice and assign them on the players cards you play to try to score more goals and concede fewer.
Try to make a career in this managerial soccer game.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Meine Tierarztpraxis
boardgame.description:
We are in a veterinary practice. The players are supposed to collect 6 different animal cards by playing the matching treatment cards. On their turn, players may place up to 2 matching treatment cards from their hand on an animal. Once the treatment is completed (between 2 and 4 treatment cards are needed), you get the animal card. If no player succeeds in collecting all 6 different animals, the player with the most points wins.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Jeder gegen jeden
boardgame.description:
The players, each of whom is assigned a color, receive 3 chips at the start of the game and must answer questions during the course of the game. To do this, the active player moves a figure across color fields by rolling the dice. The player whose color was hit must answer the question correctly or he loses a chip. The player who has no more chips is eliminated. If you can answer a question correctly and you have less than 3 chips, you get one chip back. The last player left wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Domino-Click
boardgame.description:
Principle like Dominoes. About half of the one- or two-color clickets are distributed equally to the players, the rest goes into a pot. the youngest player starts and puts a clicket on the table. Similar to dominoes, the next player must try to connect with a clicket of the same color. If he does not have the same color or if the clickets repel each other (because a magnetic south pole has hit a magnetic south pole or vice versa), the player must take an extra clicket from the pot and it is the next player's turn. The first player to run out of crickets to put on wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Buru: Kuda promo
boardgame.description:
The Kuda promo contains:
- 1 Kuda marker
- 1 fish token
- 1 action card
- 2 rule cards

The Kuda promo is available at the Kickstarter and the German Spieleschmiede crowdfunding pledge.

boardgame.name: Huskespil
boardgame.description:
Memory Game. The equipment consists of: a circular wooden board with an outer ring of 16 holes, and an inner ring of 8 holes; 24 wooden pegs, with their root painted in one of six colours; a six-sided die with each face showing one of the same six colours.
The pegs are randomly placed in the holes in the board, so that the coloured tips are invisiible, and the board randomly rotated to negate any memory of their placement.
The starting player rolls the die, and then draws a peg. If its colour matches that shown on the die, the peg is retained, the player scores a point, and has another turn (roll, draw). This continues until the peg colour does not match the die roll, in which case the peg is replaced in the same position on the board, and play passes to the next player. Once all pegs have been drawn from the board and matched, the player with the most points is the winner.

boardgame.name: Ska vi slå vad 2.0
Wanna bet? 2
boardgame.description:
Roll the die and try to perform an active or passive challenge, according to the space on which you land. The other players bet on whether you’ll be successful or not, while you win the same amount if you manage your challenge!

Comes with a Wanna Bet ball and a handy target for performing the challenges!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Skate Summer
boardgame.description:
It's summer, and you're riding the sun-drenched half-pipes of Pelican Park. Locals know there's no ledge too high, no rail too long, and no ramp too dangerous for you and your crew. Nail rad trick combos and show off your skills, but be careful — the longer you stay on your board, the more likely you are to bail!

The object of Skate Summer is to score the most points by doing trick combos, collecting goal tokens, and visiting S-K-A-T-E-R locations. The game is played in rounds. Each round has the following phases:

1. COMBOS: Players simultaneously play trick cards, earn rewards, and roll dice to check their balance.
2. SKILLS & POINTS: Players simultaneously improve their skills and score points for combos.
3. MOVES: Players take turns navigating the park, picking up goals and gear.
4. ROUND END: Each player resets their board and draws up to their hand size, then the "Pro Skater" first player marker passes to the left.

If any player's score has hit or passed the endgame token at the end of the round, the game ends and players count up their endgame points. The player with the highest score wins!
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 169: Empires of the North, Terra Mystica, Ark Nova

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Dungeons of Kards
boardgame.description: 52 Card Deck, with a Dungeons&Dragons, Heroquest RPG style you get into direct action: monsters, items, heroes and dungeons can play from 1 to 4 players or 2 against 2, games from 10 to 50min. The coolest thing is that it becomes expandable by acquiring 2 Decks. Increasing possibilities: more monsters, more items, increased dungeon and game play for up to 8 players.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Colorful Skies: Volume 2 – WWI Air War Scenarios for Check Your 6!
boardgame.description:
This is a third-party supplement that provides additional World War I scenarios for Check Your 6!. This 48-page book covers 46 historical scenarios, all from 1918, including major engagements of the American Aero Squadron (many with Eddie Rickenbacker) and the last battles of many leading aces.

Note: The original Check Your 6! rulebook and Colorful Skies (Volume 1) are required to use this supplement.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Colorful Skies: Volume 1 – WWI Air War Scenarios for Check Your 6!

boardgame.name: Colorful Skies: Volume 3 – WWI Air War Scenarios for Check Your 6!
boardgame.description:
This is a third-party supplement that provides additional World War I scenarios for Check Your 6!. This 78-page book covers 61 historical scenarios, focusing on actions in (northern) Italy with Italian and British forces vs Central Powers from 1916-1918. New balloon busting rules are also included.

Note: The original Check Your 6! rulebook and Colorful Skies (Volume 1) are required to use this supplement.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Colorful Skies: Volume 1 – WWI Air War Scenarios for Check Your 6!

boardgame.name: What's in the Bank?
boardgame.description: A quick, quirky, and strategic card game good for 2-6 players. The basic goal of the game is to get the most points (or "Francs") in your bank by the time any player gets five cards in their bank. Most cards have point values on them, from 2-10 and then 13. Each turn, a player either puts a franc in their bank, takes a card from the draw pile, or takes a card from another player's hand. There are also special cards called Sanks, Yanks, and Thanks, which either take Francs from someone else's bank, or protects Francs in your own bank.

boardgame.name: Inferno - Quickstart
boardgame.description:
Inferno is the first original Dantesque Campaign Setting for the 5th Edition of the most important RPG ever created (and played!).

It took three years to complete this project, to be published exactly on the occasion of the 7th centenary of the death of Dante Alighieri (1321-2021). The Divine Comedy, an epic narrative poem widely considered to be the pre-eminent work in Italian literature and one of the greatest piece of world literature, is adapted as a tabletop role-playing game.

Inferno is not just a hell-themed Campaign Setting like many others, but a unique and unforgettable experience. Every monster, phenomenon, environmental effect, situation, and peril of Dante's Inferno has been included in the game, to give the players a complete, philological experience of the content.

This is the quickstart book which allows you to try the game without waiting for the kickstarter to deliver.

-- from the kickstarter page

boardgame.name: Inferno - Dante's Guide to Hell
boardgame.description:
Inferno is the first original Dantesque Campaign Setting for the 5th Edition of the most important RPG ever created (and played!).

Inferno - Dante's Guide to Hell (the "Red One") is our "Player's Handbook" and completely focuses on character creation and options, setting rules, and a deep description of the Inferno itself. It could be read by players, and it explains why the PCs are there, who they are, what they could do in hell, and how to leave this supernatural realm.

-- from the kickstarter page

boardgame.name: Inferno - Virgilio's Untold Tales
boardgame.description:
Inferno is the first original Dantesque Campaign Setting for the 5th Edition of the most important RPG ever created (and played!).

Inferno - Virgilio's Untold Tales (the "Blue One") is our "Game Master's Guide" + "Monster Manual", with adventures, perils, game hooks, special equipment, a whole campaign, and the bestiary, together with a deeper description of the Inferno as a sandbox, to be used after the end of the campaign.

-- from the kickstarter page

boardgame.name: Dead God Excavation / La Bas Chartreuse
boardgame.description:
From the back cover:

The adventurers happen by just as a dead god is being excavated. Inspired by Quatermass and the Pit. DEAD GOD EXCAVATION is a short adventure for characters between 1st and 3rd level. I think it's perfect for kicking off a gonzo, eldritch, science fantasy campaign. if you incorporate this into your 'session zero"...respect, hoss!

This scenario was written for Crimson Dragon Slayer (including some new rules for clerics), but everything can be easily converted to your OSR system of choice.


LA BAS CHARTREUSE is neither an adventure nor campaign setting, but a place where Lovecraftian horror happens!

There's a Monolith and nearby a stairway down into the earth.
LA BAS CHARTREUSE contains various scenario seeds with specifics that can be used to flesh things out. You'll also find several random tables, a couple of which can be used in many, many investigative horror and eldritch pulp scenarios.

Ideally use this with The Outer Presence.

boardgame.name: 30 in 1 Game Collection
boardgame.description:
Six exotic islands filled with games and trophies are waiting for adventurers of all skill levels! Explore the islands solo, invite a group of friends over for some local co-op and competitive gameplay, or round up the troops for some wholesome family gaming! Race across island maps in a quest to be crowned Island Ruler!

Unlock trophies to customize the look of your Welcome Screen! Topple the scores of your friends and players from around the world to gain online leaderboard fame, and in the process, unlock new islands filled with a variety of new games. Become the ultimate master of 30-in-1 Game Collection!

Features:
• Tons of Games! Climb, run, jump, blast, rocket, and even dance your way through 30 games spread out across six fun-filled islands
• Explore and Collect! Earn stars by playing games to unlock new islands, and even more games
• Island Hop with Friends! Join up to three other players for friendly competitive or cooperative play with just one console and one copy of the game
• Claim the Crown! Discover trophies and climb atop the leaderboards to be crowned Island Ruler

boardgame.name: For the Love of Honey
boardgame.description:
For The Love Of Honey is a game created just for couples!

This game gives you the chance to turn off the TV, hide your phones, and just have FUN together.

There are 2 stacks of cards with 4 categories so you can play this game over and over!

The categories are:

Who Knows Who Better
Trivia
Compete
Don't Be Scared


If you know a couple that loves games, works too hard and could use some quality 1 on 1 time, or just loves having fun, this is perfect for them!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Get Out of Bed
boardgame.description:
This super fun card game tests how well you know your partner, with a twist!

If you like getting competitive and could use a fun way to sneak in a little workout together, this is the perfect game for you!

There are 2 deck of card with a mixture of 'Two Truths and a Lie' cards and 'Would You Rather' cards. Guess what your partner will say and if you're wrong, you have to do the penalty on the card!

Laugh, have fun, and learn something new about one another!

—description from from the publisher

boardgame.name: Numenera Playmat
boardgame.description:
From publisher's website:

In Numenera, players roll all the dice. And there aren’t a great many tables or charts a GM needs to reference during play. So many gaming groups prefer an alternative to the traditional GM screen, one that removes the barrier between GM and player.

The Numenera playmat is a beautiful centerpiece on your gaming table. And it’s also practical: along the edges there’s reference info of interest to the GM and the players—things like damage track and special roll result info, task difficulty and damage from hazards tables for the GM, distance definitions, armor and weapon damage info, and other things players and GMs sometimes look up during play. It’s all there in front of you so that you can focus on your story, not on flipping through the book.

The pleasant fabric surface with non-slip rubberized backing gives you a great die-rolling surface. It’s well-sized at 24″ x 32″, large enough to show of its art and information nicely, but not too big for your gaming table. The stunning artwork by Federico Musetti really shines, showcasing the beauty and mystery of the Ninth World. The Numenera playmat is a gorgeous and useful centerpiece for your Numenera game!

boardgame.name: コントラスト (Contrast)
boardgame.description:
Contrast is a two-player abstract board game in the same vein as Shogi, Chess, and Checkers; with the simple goal of reaching the other side of the player board.
The transparent pieces with black and white arrows change in appearance and effect based on the background under them (a black background will hide the black arrows, a white background will hide the white arrows, and a grey background will show both).

A mysterious gimmick with simple rules, but deeper strategy than meets the eye.

boardgame.name: Ordered Witch
boardgame.description:
Ordered Witch is a fast board game for families for children that are around 4 years old.

We are little witches who need to sort the magic items that have escaped from their cupboards.

Will you be the first witch to climb to the top of the tower?

On our turn we can play a family (by item or by color) or we can play a wand to other player (wands have negative effects).

When we complete a family we gain 1 point and when we have no cards in hands we gain as points as families are in the table.

The objective is to climb to the top of the tower (15 points).

-description from publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Organizations: Board Games Association of Creators in Spain (LUDO)

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Santiago de Compostela
boardgame.description:
Waking up one day, you are filled with the overflowing passion to be as the travelers of ancient biblical times, and decide to travel to the holy land of Spain, the city of Santiago de Compostela. You thus begin your travels from your hometown of Paris to Santiago and finally return home the way whence you came.

The game is begun by shuffling the number cards (the companion cards) and laying them out between Paris and Santiago. When your turn comes, advance your pilgrim card as much as you like and earn a travel companion card. There is no restriction on the distance you can travel towards the card you desire, but there is no turning back once you advance your pilgrim.

How do you turn your journey into the best pilgrimage? By collecting travel companions (number cards)! You must choose number cards very carefully. In order to score the most by the cards you collect, you must collect as many of the same cards as possible, or collect various kind of cards. For example, the number 1 card allows you to score with just one card, but you must collect a large amount of number 9 cards (and/or a variety of cards) in order to score with them! In this game, you win by scoring more points than other pilgrims in a total of two rounds: a journey from Paris to Santiago and another one from Santiago to Paris.

“Maybe the real treasure was the friends we made along the way”.

boardgame.name: The Hunger: Vampire Promo Sheets
boardgame.description: A set of the 6 character sheets which give each playable vampire a one time per game ability. These were handed out at conventions or as a bonus for pre-ordering the base game through Renegade Games website.

boardgame.name: Necromunda: Book of the Outcast
boardgame.description:
Expand your games of Necromunda with a wealth of new rules to add even more variety, scope, and excitement to your battles in the underhive. With this book you can explore the dark expanse of the hive city's badzones, striking out to found settlements and expand your territory in Outlands campaigns, as well as enlisting the aid of brand new Dramatis Personae to join or even lead your Underhive Outcasts gang.

Inside this 136-page book you'll find:

– Outcasts of Necromunda: Extensive background information on outcasts gangs, covering aspects such as the badzones, the scum that comprise an Underhive Outcasts gang, and why such maligned members of the underhive would be inclined to sign up

– Assembling the Outcasts: Includes all the rules you need to know in order to field an outcasts gang in skirmish and narrative games of Necromunda, including gang composition, weapons and wargear, and additional rules for creating your own charismatic Leader with a personality all their own

– Hangers-On and Brutes: Includes rules for hiring Hangers-on and Brutes, for both skirmish and narratives games

– Outlander Terrain: All the terrain rules needed to establish a stronghold for Necromunda gangs, usable with the included Outlander Campaign or any game of Necromunda, as well as rules for fighting across Underhive Markets, Walls and Gates, Watchtowers, and Gunk Tanks

– Wyrd Powers: Light up the underhive with rules for Wyrd Powers and Force Weapons that canand Telekinesis

– Outlander Campaigns: Embark on a narrative campaign to build and grow a settlement while defending and denying resources from your rivals, and assume the role of an Arbitrator keeping the campaign on an even keel while players work through three real-time phases training recruits, gathering resources, and recovering from the wear and tear of underhive combat

– Outlander Scenarios: Rules for six new outcasts-themed scenarios – Settlement Raid, Market Mayhem, Stealth Attack, Gunk Tank, Mining Expedition and The Big Score – each including rules for playing the battle, rewards gained for victory, experience, reputation, and special rules for these scenarios

– Showcase: A full-colour section spotlighting miniatures, battle scenes, and alternative outcasts colour schemes

– Outcasts Gang Tactics: Eighteen new Gang Tactics for use in games, plus rules and background for Lady Credo, Rebel Lord – a unique Rebel Lord who can be chosen as an Underhive Outcasts Leader at gang creation

– Trading Post: Weapons, armour, and equipment available to Underhive Outcasts gangs, who must rely on whatever they can find and barter for without the backing of the major Houses

– A Weapon Reference Chart containing a comprehensive weapons reference chart for all weapons and wargear available on the Trading Post for outcasts gangs

– Dramatis Personae: Includes rules for hiring and using three brand-new Dramatis Personae in your games of Necromunda

This is an expansion to Necromunda – you'll need a copy of the Necromunda Rulebook to use the contents of this book.

-description from publisher's website

boardgame.name: Fort Sumter: Solo Opponent
boardgame.description: GMT One’s free Christmas print and play for 2021. With this Solo Opponent, Fort Sumter can be played by a single Player with the game controlling the side not controlled by the Player. Using the same system as Red Flag Over Paris, the Fort Sumter Solo Opponent is a tough challenge for one.

boardgame.name: Twisted History
boardgame.description: A historical trivia game that sees you moving through different time periods and answering questions about that time. For every answer you get wrong, you build part of your own execution device. Get 9 incorrect answers and you are out of the game.

boardgame.name: Hero of the Kingdom: The Lost Tales 2
boardgame.description:
You are having a small adventure outside the city walls. You are the princess, in the guise of a rogue. However, returning home is no longer possible. The city is on fire and the streets have been plundered by hordes of unknown monsters. People are leaving their homes in panic and seek refuge from certain doom. But this is your city and your people. You can’t lie idle. You have to protect your city and get allies to fight by your side against great evil. Gain courage and become a heroic princess.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Yeti Slap
boardgame.description: Yeti Slap is a speed card game where players try to get rid of their cards the fastest. Player's slap down cards on top of matches, but if an action comes up, players must be the fastest to do the action and then can slap down another card on the action card. Learn in 5 minutes, play for years!

boardgame.name: Jungleball
boardgame.description:
Jungleball is a small box dexterity game where you can draft a team of all-stars discovering powerful synergies between the large roster of unique players! You can assemble your players around an arena that changes with every game, toss dodgeballs at your opponents, move around the field, activate abilities, AND land critical hits until only one team remains!

Do you have what it takes to be a Jungleball champion?

Jungleball is a dexterity game that plays in about 15 minutes. The game is played through a sequence of turns where players will throw small wooden disks at their opponent's characters hoping to land on them and get them out. Every character has a number indicating the amount of dodgeballs that can land on them before they must go out. Activating a character allows the player to move that character anywhere on the board, use that character's unique ability, and then throw dodgeballs (wooden disks) from wherever they move that character to. Play ends if all the characters on one team go out, the player with characters remaining is the victor!

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Horseshoes & Hand Grenades Card Game
boardgame.description:
An explosive card game unlike any other for friend and foe alike. Rule game night by obliterating the competition with unique card types. Set the charges or pull the pin early and let the sparks fly because only one player can call themselves the victor in this all out brawl of Horseshoes & Hand Grenades!

- Obliterate the competition with Hand Grenade cards.
- Shield yourself from the opposition with Horseshoe cards.
- Defy the actions of others with Short Fuse cards.

Play as a team or fight alone, the choice is yours. All that matters is that you are the last one standing.

Begin by choosing who goes first, preferably the least liked of your friends, who smells the worst, has the loudest burp or is the mostly to die first (in the game, don't be so morbid). The chosen player with then shuffle the deck and deal every player 5 cards and 5 Heart Tokens. The player to the left of the dealer will then begin the game with the first play action as the Active Player.

Once a player loses all 5 Heart Tokens, they are out. So, make sure to maintain your defenses since any defenses that are down, leave your Heart Tokens completely exposed.

On the Active Players turn, they can play 1 Hand Grenade card to attack with and 1 Horseshoe card to build up their defenses. No more than 3 Horseshoe cards can be in play for each player. After they have completed their two actions, they must draw a card to end their turn so that the Active Player status transfers to the next player on the left.

On the Inactive Players turn, they can play Short Fuse cards in response to any action performed by the Active Player or other Inactive Players, shifting the tides to favor themselves or others. But, they must be careful, since the Active Player can play Short Fuses in response to others.

In the end, only one shall remain. You may refer to yourself as the victor, but everyone else may refer to you as a frag-faced-fuck. So, pull the pin, count to 3 and have some explosive fun with Horseshoes & Hand Grenades.

boardgame.name: Aventuria: Bornländische Katzenhexe Heldenset
boardgame.description:
Dieses Heldenset enthält das Heldendeck der Bornländischen Katzenhexe Rovena aus dem Überwals. Außerdem sind die Kurzabenteuer Hexenreigen und Ein Goblin mehr oder weniger und alle dafür erforderlichen Spielkarten enthalten.
—description from the publisher

This hero set contains the hero deck of the Bornland cat witch Rovena. In addition two short adventures 'Hexenreigen' and 'Ein Goblin mehr oder weniger' and all necessary playing cards are included.
—user translation

This hero was previously part of the discontinued expansion Aventuria: Heroes' Struggle. This is due to the reorientation of the game with its new expansions of the last (german) crowdfunding Aventuria: Mythische Geschichten and Pfad der Legenden. With these the game focuses a lot more on narrative and therefore less on the old short story adventures of Heroes' Struggle.

boardgame.name: Aventuria: Hero Token
boardgame.description:
Aventuria - Heldenmarken GN, MZA, NSH, FET
4 Heldenmarken zu den Heldensets:
- Diener des Namenlosen
- Meisterin der Alchemie
- Schleiertänzerin
- Schatzjäger

—description from the publisher

Aventuria - Hero Token GN, MZA, NSH, FET
4 hero token for the hero sets:
- Servant of the Nameless One
- Magistra of Alchemy
- Veil Dancer
- Treasure Hunter

—user translation

boardgame.name: The New Marvel-Phile (2021 Annual)
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

The first release this month is our 2021 Annual! Yeah, we missed last year's annual, but hopefully we made up for it with this year's issue, featuring the Young Avengers! Enjoy!

boardgame.name: Tsukuyumi: Full Moon Down Playmat
boardgame.description:
A double sided 29x44 inch playmat with standard plain hex spaces on one side and hexes with artistic overlay on the other. Compatible with first or second edition tiles.

This was an exclusive add-on item during the Kickstarter for the Second edition, or for those that went "all in" on their pledge.

boardgame.name: Shaktis
boardgame.description:
Two Players Explore Psychotropic Plants and Philosophy in a Strategic Board game, competing for the Title of the Forest Wizard.

The Winner is the One who can Cultivate Their Own Garden.

This game offers a new concept for playing and education, hosting a space for exploration of the mind too.

In terms of strategy, you must learn how to manipulate the Nature Spirits, within the Forest, to help you establish and cultivate a garden. At the same time, you must find a way to outplay your opponent, with whom you must also cooperate to win. The game always reveals a true Wizard, as the Forest wants to employ someone who knows how to use their skills and wisdom.

Difficulty/complexity levels: Chess/Poker.
On average, it takes one game-play to learn. With the second game, one starts to understand strategies and gains full confidence.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Age of Wonders: Planetfall
boardgame.description:
The heyday of the Star Union has come to an end. Setting off massive Gravity-Bombs designed to create spatial rifts to new worlds led to the Collapse, and many planets were cut off from the rest of the Empire.

The surviving factions began gradually rebuilding civilization and rediscovering lost technology. Being once part of a single state, they will have to meet again and find out who is worthy of succeeding the great power.

You are the Commander of one of the six surviving groups that have set out to explore the once-abandoned parts of the Star Union. Your expedition will explore seven planets in search of valuable resources and technology, battle hostile units, and seize landmarks. Will you be able to create a new world from the shards of the old Empire?

The game is played over 7 rounds, and a new planet is explored each round. Each player may conduct 2 explorations on every planet. The players will gain Empire points by defeating Units, studying Technology, claiming Landmarks, and running Operations on those planets. At the end of the game, players will score Empire points for meeting certain conditions listed on a particular Goal sheet. Whoever scores the most Empire points wins.

boardgame.name: Traveler's Diary of Umpessa
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

The Nation of Umpessa offers a country full of possibilities for your D&D adventures. It creates room for prosperous steampunk cities nestled between mountain ranges, extensive train journeys that leave much time to solve (or commit?) intricate murders, clandestine political intrigues within a longstanding ruling family, and most importantly the Umpessa Institute of Arcane Practices. This guide will especially discuss this magical academy in greater detail.

boardgame.name: Bob Hosey
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

A Troika! background for people who are tired of being thirsty and maybe like waterbeds.

boardgame.name: Thorngate Dungeon
boardgame.description:
A Single Sheet Print and Play Eurogame. Simple to pick up play with plenty of strategy, depth and decision space.

Thorngate Tower has been taken over by all manner of unworldy creatures. Your task is to initially clear out the dungeon area. Whilst slaying foes from 4 different realms to gain the favour of Thorngates guild owners you must also try to rescue as much treasure as you can along the way in order to prove that you are worthy of entering the remainder of the Tower.

Thorngate Dungeon is played over a series of 16 Rounds where in each you will be taking actions based on the rolls of 4 dice. Everything is contained on a single sheet of A4 paper and all that is needed from you is a pencil per player and 4 dice for the whole group.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Pocket Kingdom
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb

Islands sometimes appear out of the blue in the clouds. The mysterious Pocket Kingdom is one of them. Wander around its districts, solve puzzles and listen to the weird stories told by the locals. Unveiling the place's mysteries depends on it. So does getting out of it.

Pocket Kingdom is an authentic throwback to the Amiga era. Signature steampunk pixel art, winsome chiptune soundtrack and retro-inspired gameplay with modern twists make Pocket Kingdom an unparalleled journey.

boardgame.name: Edisons Enzyklopädie
boardgame.description:
[From the back of the book (German)]

Edisons Enzyklopädie - Kompendium der Technologien & Regeln

Ein Schwimmanzug? Ein selbst konstruiertes Ätherschiff? Oder eine Erdbebenmaschine? Mit den hier vorgestellten Erfindungsregeln können Ihre Charaktere (und deren skrupellose Gegenspieler) jede Menge nützliche und spektakuläre Erfindungen machen. Von einigen hilfreichen Bonuswürfeln bis zur Herrschaft über das Sonnensystem.

Ein Kampf zwischen einer marsianischen Schraubengaleere und einem britischem Kanonenflugschiff? Eine Seeschlacht im Südchinesischen Meer? Eine Verfolgungsjagd im Schatten des Kölner Doms? Die Regeln zum Fahrzeugkampf ermöglichen schnelle und einfache Gefechte und bieten gleichzeitig zahlreiche Möglichkeiten für Charaktere, mit ihren Fähigkeiten zu glänzen. Im Jagdzeppelin, auf einer Panzerfregatte oder einem Wasser-Veloziped.

Abenteuer mit jugendlichen Charakteren? Eine militärische Kampagne mit großen Schlachten? Das Spiel mit außerirdischen Charakteren, die die seltsamen Bräuche der Erdbewohner kennenlernen? Für diese und mehr Kampagnentypen werden zahlreiche Tipps gegeben und ausgewählte Sonderregelungen vorgestellt.

Zusammen mit umfassenden Ergänzungen für die Erschaffung von Charakteren und Nichtspielercharakteren gleichermaßen, mit vielen neuen oder überarbeiteten Archetypen, Schwächen und Talenten, bietet Edisons Enzyklopädie jede Menge Regeln und Material für ein noch vielseitigeres, erfindungsreiches und action-geladenes Spiel in der Welt von Space: 1889.

boardgame.name: Dice & Towers
boardgame.description:
Dice & Towers is a push-your-luck polyhedral dice game for 1-6 players.


Roll the special "Die Die" to determine which dice to stack next (example: rolling a 12 means stack the D12).
Stack dice to build a tower as high as you choose - but don't let it fall!
Roll the dice from your tower to earn points.
Win by earning the most combined points in three turns.


—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Cowpie Catapults
boardgame.description:
It’s Cow Pie Catapults – the poo flippin’, cow tippin’ battle of the barnyard! Arrange your cows on your side of the barnyard, load up the catapults, and let the fun begin! On 3-2-1 poo is launched through the air and lands with splendid splats. First player to knock over all the opponent’s cows is the winner!

-description from publisher's website

boardgame.name: Food Who?
boardgame.description:
This is a game for 2 players with each their own game board filled with 24 types of food. The opponent has to guess the food to win.

The game dynamics are similar to Guess Who?, the mystery face game where you flip over a collection of faces with different color hair, eye color, hair, hats, glasses etc. to deduce who the secret person is that your opponent has chosen. In Food Who? you flip over the hooked tiles with pizza, pies, meats, snacks, vegetables, etc. as you narrow your choices by asking characteristic questions.

boardgame.name: MicroMacro: Crime City – Full House: Die Schwarze Witwe
MicroMacro: Crime City – Full House: La Veuve Noire
boardgame.description: An exclusive bonus case for MicroMacro: Crime City - Full House.

boardgame.name: QUIZscape: Probe-Spiel
boardgame.description:
A demo case for the QUIZscape series, published by moses Verlag. This demo contains a very small time travel story that demonstrates the mechanisms of the QUIZscape games. The players have to travel through time to rescue a missing team.

Each card contains a riddle that has to be solved to continue in the story.

boardgame.name: Tash-Kalar: Arena of Legends – Meeple Realty Insert
boardgame.description:
Fits the base game and all expansions currently available.
The insert will fit inside the game box and box will sit flush. The game can also be stored vertically.
Designed for faster setup.
Adjustable card tray to separate the cards by types.
Fits sleeved cards.
Additional space available for future expansions.
This is an officially licensed product by CGE.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Tash-Kalar: Arena of Legends – Legendary Summoner Promo
Tash-Kalar: Arena of Legends – Love Elemental Promo Card

boardgame.name: Cartographers Map Pack 4: Frozen Expanse – Realm of Frost Giants
boardgame.description:
Chill winds howl across the Frozen Expanse, where the Kaiika make their home and fearsome Frost Giants lumber through the snow. Queen Gimnax sent you to this cursed place with the fruits of a past expedition: the torn scraps of a map, partially finished by another cartographer who did not survive the journey. Now it’s up to you to finish mapping the Frozen Expanse with the work of an ill-fated guildfellow to guide your way.

75 double-sided new map sheets featuring pre-scouted spaces and a frozen lake.
Two new ambush cards and one new hero card.
New gameplay focusing on restricted terrain placement requirements and a large gold bonus for surrounding a lake to discover an ancient relic submerged below.

This map pack can be played with either Cartographers: A Roll Player Tale or Cartographers Heroes.

boardgame.name: Corrida de Canetas
boardgame.description:
Experience the thrill of hectic and challenging races without needing much.

Pen Races is a dexterity racing game in which players race each other to see who completes the circuits before the others. You score points by finishing before the opponents but for every fault you lose points. Some challenges are put into play and if you complete them during your run, you add some points to your ranking.

After 3 races, whoever has conquered the most points win.
The game can be expandable for more players if you put two boxes together.

Who better to combine speed and precision wins the match.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Cartographers Map Pack 5: Kethra's Steppe – Redtooth & Goldbelly
boardgame.description:
From the grassy plain of Kethra’s Steppe rise the twin spires of Redtooth Peak and Goldbelly Mountain. In addition to charting the terrain around these mountains, you must rekindle the mysterious beacons atop their summits. These fires once burned every night to represent the eye of Kethra, goddess of thresholds and gates. Queen Gimnax hopes that renewing their flames will gain her the goddess’s favor, perhaps opening the door to other worlds.

75 double-sided new map sheets featuring twin spires and beacon ranges.
Three new scoring cards specifically for use with this map pack that are used in addition to the regular scoring cards.
New gameplay focusing on lighting beacons. Once surrounded, a beacon is lit and will be scored at the end of the season.

This map pack can be played with either Cartographers: A Roll Player Tale or Cartographers Heroes.

boardgame.name: Cartographers Map Pack 6: Hornhelm – Wasteland Market
boardgame.description:
Deep in the barren wastes lies the famed Saurian market at Hornhelm, where merchants from across Ulos gather to hawk their wares. On display are fine fabrics, aromatic spices, and a variety of impressively crafted goods. Of particular interest to you are the merchants selling specialized gear that can increase the speed of your labour and the accuracy of your maps. Improve your tradecraft by equipping yourself with items from the wasteland market.

150 double-sided new map sheets. Each player uses a map sheet to chart their territory and a market sheet to track market purchases.
Six merchant cards that identify which items are for sale after each season.
Purchase items that grant ongoing effects. Use of the items is tracked on the journal track, adding the player’s final score.

This map pack can be played with either Cartographers: A Roll Player Tale or Cartographers Heroes.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: War Chest: Laserox Organizer Dividers
boardgame.description: Extra dividers for War Chest Organizer.

boardgame.name: Jannasaras Kartentasche
Jannasaras Tagebuch
boardgame.description:
[User Summary]
Bundle of two A4 hardcovers with metal corners in a slipcase, two slipcases containing 36 A3-sized maps and a transparent rastered PVC sleeve each.
The books (each book referring to one of the two map cases) include extensive descriptions and scenario ideas for the places shown on the maps.

Golden Book/Map case: "wilderness and ancient ruins"
Silver Book/Map case: "Cities and towns"

[Publisher blurb (German)]
Jannasaras Kartentasche bietet dir dramatische Schauplätze und auf die Orte maßgeschneiderte Abenteuerideen. Die Erlebnisberichte aus der Perspektive der Abenteuerin Jannasara geben dir einen einzigartigen Einblick auf Augenhöhe und ziehen dich in ihre Welt hinein. Ihre inspirierenden Schilderungen ergänzen die liebevoll von Hand gestalteten Karten, die fremde Welten am Spieltisch greifbar machen.

Was zeichnet das Print-Komplettpaket aus?

- Die Tagebücher: Auf jeweils 288 Seiten stecken diese beiden edlen Hardcover-Bücher im Format A4 voller Inspirationen, Abenteuerideen, Charakterbeschreibungen und hilfreicher Legenden zu den Karten.
- Die Goldene Mappe: 36 Karten im Format A3 von wildem Land und von alten Orten für deine Geschichten. Die Karten reichen von uralten Ritualstätten im dunklen Forst über die alte Klosterburgruine, die auf ihrem Felsgrat thront, bis zu einem ausgetrockneten Wadi in der Wüste und einem verwunschenen Weiler im Nirgendwo.
- Die Silberne Mappe: 36 Karten im Format A3 von Städtchen und Dörfern. Du findest hier beispielsweise das prächtige Lustschlösschen mit Hunderten von Bewohnern, das Hafenviertel von Arronca, eine Wüstenoase oder auch ein befestigtes Städtchen voller verfeindeter Familien.
- Kartenraster: Beiden Mappen liegt ein Kartenraster aus glasklarem PVC bei, das du mit einem Folienschreiber, wie z.B. dem Edding 150S, beschriften kannst.
- Klimaneutral: Buch und Kartenmappen sind klimaneutral in Deutschland hergestellt. Die Kartenserie wurde mit dem Blauen Engel ausgezeichnet.

Jannasaras Kartentasche kann mehr!

Jedes fantastische Abenteuer braucht einen charakteristischen Schauplatz. Jede ungewöhnliche Geschichte einen spannenden Handlungsort. Unsere Karten bieten dir mehr als das! Liebevoll gestaltet und mit einem Auge für die Details entworfen, ziehen dich unsere Karten in fremde Welten hinein und begeistern ab dem ersten Blick.

Jannasaras Kartentasche ist jedoch mehr als eine Kartensammlung. Die Karten gehen Hand in Hand mit den sie begleitenden Büchern.

So machen unsere Karten fremde Welten greifbar, während unsere reisende Erzählerin Jannasara dir in ihrem Tagebuch von ihren Erlebnissen berichtet. Sie bereichert jeden Schauplatz um ihre einzigartigen Erfahrungen, die du direkt aufgreifen kannst.

Die packenden Beschreibungen bringen den Ort zum Leben und versorgen dich mit Charakteren, lokaler Folklore und zusätzlichen Informationen. Außerdem findest du in den Tagebüchern zu jedem Schauplatz passende Abenteuerideen, falls du einmal nach Inspiration suchst.

Jannasaras Kartentasche ist klimaneutral mit umweltschonenden Materialien in Deutschland hergestellt.

boardgame.name: Hello Kitty & Amigos: Um dia para Relaxar
boardgame.description:
Hello Kitty and her friends have a nice day ahead and must decide what to do. But every one has his preferences (randomly distributed in the beginning of the game). Where they go?

There are 16 different activities and the player use a dice to manipulate the position of every activity in a "Preference Scale".

Each time an activity reach the spot 8 in the preference scale, the players stop the game to make a decision: Are we according to go to this activity? In order to do so, every player has a hand of five cards (4 "No" cards and 1 "Yes" card). If any player use a No Card, the activity is discarded. Yes Cards return to the players, but "No" cards are also discarded, so the players will have less opportunities to use "No" cards during the game.

If an activity receives only yes cards, the game ends and the players receive victory points according the position of his/her preference activity in the preference scale. Discarded activities bring no victory points.

boardgame.name: Gathering of the Wicked: Cruella De Vil & Jasper and Horace
boardgame.description:
A new villain team to add to the game:

Cruella de Vil:

Before each group vote, insist that a certain player votes against another player of your choice. If they refuse, they are automatically vanquished.

Jasper and Hoarace:

Jasper and Hoarace do not have a special ability. Disney Henchmen who vote against their Disney Villain couterpart run serious risks. If they choose to vote against their Disney Villain, and if the Disney Villain is vanquished and found to be a member of Team Mayhem, then the Disney Henchman is immediately vanquished too!

Promo pack was available for free with purchase of the game during launch.

boardgame.name: Vendetta
boardgame.description:
[back of the book]
Überfälle auf offener Straße, Entführungen, Attentate, explodierende Restaurants: Die deutsch-italienische Mafia ist in einem Familienkrieg gefangen, und die Blutrache wurde geschworen. Vater und Tochter kämpfen um Ehre, Tradition und die Führung des organisierten Verbrechens. Mitten in den Vorbereitungen zu den Stadtkriegsweltmeisterschaften zieht der Konflikt die Aufmerksamkeit der Obrigkeit und anderer Mächte auf sich. Wird die Mafia diesen Krieg überleben? Werden es die Runner? Und kann eine Partie Stadtkrieg die Lösung bringen?

Vendetta ist eine Eigenproduktion von Pegasus Press und ein Kampagnenband für Shadowrun 6, der im Rhein-Ruhr-Plex spielt. In vier Akten werden die Runner in den Krieg zwischen den Generationen innerhalb der Mafia hineingezogen und können erleben, wie sich dieser lang schwelende Konflikt gewaltsam löst. Wer wird am Ende das Rennen machen? Welchen Zug wird die Gegenseite als nächstes planen? In vollständig ausgearbeiteten Runs, mit etlichen Sandboxen und Hintergrundinfos kannst du am eigenen Spieltisch deinen Runnern das Schicksal der deutsch-italienischen Mafia in der ADL in die Hände legen.

boardgame.name: Budenzauber
boardgame.description:
[back of the book]
Im Rhein-Ruhr-Plex regieren die Mächtigen der Unterwelt und der Konzerne. Trotzdem gibt es in dem riesigen Moloch auch in den Hinterhöfen und den schattigen Seitengassen viel zu tun für Runner. Oft steht dabei der Kiosk im Zentrum des Geschehens: Das Büdchen, das als soziales Auffangnetz, Versorgungsquelle und illegaler Umschlagsplatz dient. Ob es um verschollene Critter, geraubtes Bier oder um verirrte Konzernsprösslinge geht – an diesen Buden hinter der nächsten Ecke kommt kaum jemand vorbei.

Budenzauber ist eine Eigenproduktion von Pegasus Press und eine Anthologie für Shadowrun 6 mit drei Einzelabenteuern. Alle Abenteuer sind komplett spielfertig. Im Schatten der Büdchen des Rhein-Ruhr-Plex zieht es die Runner dabei in merkwürdige Vorkommnisse innerhalb der Nachbarschaft, die sich als gefährlicher herausstellen, als es irgendjemand ahnen könnte.

boardgame.name: Mission Sioux Nation
boardgame.description:
German publication, containing the translations of Shadows in Focus: Sioux Nation, Shadows in Focus: Sioux Nation - Starving the Masses and Shadows in Focus: Sioux Nation - Counting Coup

[back of the book]
Willkommen in Sioux Nation

Arkane Orte voller Macht. Megakonzerne mit finsteren Plänen. Schmuggler und Schamanen, Stammeshäuptlinge und rebellische Einzelgänger. All dies erwartet Runner bei einem Besuch in der Sioux Nation – und noch vieles mehr.

Mission Sioux Nation enthält einen detaillierten Einblick in die junge nordamerikanische Nation, in der Konzerne, Magie und alte Stammesriten das Schicksal bestimmen. Arkane Stätten voller Macht, gierige Megakons, große Städte und wilde Natur, all dies findet sich in diesem Band für Shadowrun 5, zusätzlich zu zwei großen Abenteuern: In Hungerbringer wandern die Runner auf dem schmalen Grad des Chaos entlang, während sie für Theo Two-Hearts einen wichtigen Job erledigen müssen – und dabei auf eine der stärksten Mächte der Sioux Nation treffen. In Eine strahlende Zukunft müssen die Runner für einen JackPoint-Kontakt nicht nur illegal über die Grenze kommen, sondern sich auch mit der Sioux National Police anlegen.

boardgame.name: Revierbericht 2082
boardgame.description:
German Sourcebook on the Rhine-Ruhr-Area for the sixth edition.

[back of the book]
Der Rhein-Ruhr-Megaplex. Eine riesige Fusion unterschiedlichster Städte und sozialer Schichten, die zusammen einen Schmelztiegel der Kulturen und Subkulturen bilden. Ein Moloch, eine von der Metamenschheit selbst erbaute Hölle für die einen. Ein Paradies des Ausbeutens, der Schatten und der Machtspiele für andere. Und für manche ist es nur der Vorgarten ihres internationalen Imperiums. Von den japanischen Restaurants in Düsseldorf über die Schwarzmärkte in Köln, die toxischen Brachen Oberhausens, die anarchistischen Zonen in Recklinghausen, die Hochsicherheitsenklaven in Neu-Essen bis in die tiefsten Kellergeschosse des überbauten Wuppertals: Die Grautöne dieses gigantischen Metroplex sind so vielfältig wie seine Einwohner und seine Gefahren. Wo Unterweltkriege toben, Konzerngewalten aufeinander prallen, Autoduellisten die nächtlichen Straßen unsicher machen und Critter durch Kleingartenvereine schleichen, da können Runner Glück und Reichtum finden – oder einen schnellen Tod.

Der Revierbericht 2082 ist eine Eigenproduktion von Pegasus Press und ein Quellenbuch für Shadowrun 6. Es bietet detaillierte Hintergrundinformationen zu den einzelnen Städten des Rhein-Ruhrplex, zu vielen Orten, Hotspots wie der Düsseldorfer Innenstadt oder Wuppertal und einen tiefen Einblick in die Machtstrukturen zwischen Gangs, Unterwelt und Konzernen. Neben Beschreibungen zu der Kultur an der Ruhr, den Vorgängen in alten Bergwerken und der anarchischen Sonderrechtszone Recklinghausen wird zudem viel Zusatzmaterial geboten: NSC-Werte, Grundrisse, Flairtipps für den Spieltisch, Ausrüstung sowie große Karten des gesamten Plex und ausgewählter Stadtteile mit verorteten Locations.

boardgame.name: ヘクサ・ルインス (Hexa Ruins)
boardgame.description:
ヘクサ・ルインス (Hexa Ruins) is a roll & write game from Japan. Players are exploring a jungle land for treasures and ruins. Key to the game is the date and time you play. At the start of the game, write these down on your sheet, and the numbers create your starting equipment and coins.

As the game progresses, you roll a red and a blue die and make your moves across the hex map of the landscape. The die rolls apply to your equipment and coins, and you choose how you move. The map shows water, plains, mountains and treasure sites. In the top corner is the fabled Hexa Ruins. The game ends when a player reaches here, or after 30 turns.

Players calculate their scores based on their exploration and the most points wins.

The publisher has already released new maps for PnP purchase online.
user summary
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: ヘクサ・ルインス 〜クロコダイルとドレイクの島〜 (Hexa Ruins: The Island of Crocodiles and Drakes -)

boardgame.name: Schattenspieler - Begegnungen in der sechsten Welt
boardgame.description:
German card deck containing various NSC including portraits and stat blocks for Shadowrun: Sixth World (6th Edition). Contains all 50 NSC from the english "Rogue's Gallery" as well as 20 new NSC.

Contains 70 NSC cards, 7 reference cards (for the gear in the NSC cards) and 3 blank cards.

[back of the box]
In den dunklen Schatten abgelegener Seitenstraßen, in den angesagtesten Clubs der Stadt, in den obersten Chefetagen der Megakonzerne: Überall warten gefährliche Gegenspieler und herausfordernde Begegnungen auf Shadowrunner.

Schattenspieler für Shadowrun 6 kommt in einer Kartenspielschachtel und enthält neben den 50 amerikanischen Charakteren aus der Rogue's Gallery noch 20 weitere Charaktere aus der ADL – mit Werten und Beschreibungen, um alle 70 NSC direkt auf den Spieltisch zu bringen.

boardgame.name: What's the Story? Story Telling Cards
boardgame.description:
What’s the Story? invites children to retell and create stories with playful animal characters and adventures. There are endless ways to use these cards. The publishers include many suggestions and you can develop your own.

The game includes many rule variants, with differing win conditions including some requiring a certain number of cards to win.


description from publisher **

boardgame.name: Moly Atrapa
boardgame.description:
In the forests of Chile, there is a great plague of invasive bugs, which unbalance the ecosystem and they consume natural resources, displacing native species. The spider Moly, of the species Molinaranea magellanica, is a great jacket that uses its colors to camouflage itself between tree branches, where it weaves its net to hunt its prey. Help Moly build her fabric.
Roll the dice, draw a spider web, improve your stamina and your knowledge of the bugs in the puzzles, to catch the most invading bugs, and thus score the most points.
—description from the designer

En los bosques de Chile, hay una gran plaga de bichos invasores, que desequilibran el ecosistema y consumen los recursos naturales, desplazando a las especies nativas. La araña Moly, de la especie
Molinaranea magellanica, es una gran cazadora que utiliza sus colores para camuflarse entre las
ramas de los árboles, en donde teje su red para cazar a sus presas.

Lanzen los dados, dibujen una telaraña, mejoren su resistencia y sus conocimientos sobre los bichos en los puzles, para atrapar a la mayor cantidad de insectos invasores, y así conseguir la mayor cantidad de puntos.

—description from the designer (Spanish)
boardgame.boardgameintegration: Yuncos: El lado oscuro de la luz
Yuncos: El lado oscuro de la luz

boardgame.name: Times Square
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

They call it the Center of the Universe - and in the MARVEL Universe, that just may be true! Now the iconic setting of Times Square and Manhattan’s Theater District can be in your MARVEL SUPER HEROES campaign, with this sourcebook featuring a gazetteer to Times Square locations and a full-sized playable map that connects with the classic TSR maps!

boardgame.name: BABEL: 0
boardgame.description:
An expansion set that adds a new way to play "BABEL".

Each player bids off the right to build the Tower of Babel and raises the tower while earning points. At the end of the game, the player with the most points wins. The winning bidder does not necessarily build the tower. The tower will be built by the person with the highest total score at the time of winning the auction. If they fail to build it, they will lose immediately. The player with the second highest score at that time will be the winner.
boardgame.boardgamedesigner: Masakazu Takizawa (たきざわ まさかず)
boardgame.boardgameartist: Masakazu Takizawa (たきざわ まさかず)

boardgame.name: Jikkuri Millet: Masterpiece Box Vol. 2 “Winter Masterpiece”
boardgame.description: Expansion that includes 16 pieces of art with the theme of winter, special large scoring rose, and 6 new cards. Requires the base game to play.

boardgame.name: Crazy Bull
boardgame.description:
HAVE YOU GOT WHAT IT TAKES? This game requires good skills and a strategy in order to win.. simply load the bull up with you accessories, wind it up and watch as he goes crazy trying to get the stuff off his back! Tipping up, down and around the bull will make sure he's victorious.. unless you think you can beat him!

The player that collects the most items is the winner of the game.

boardgame.name: Jikkuri Millet: Masterpiece Box Vol 1
boardgame.description:
Expansion that includes 20 pieces of art, special large scoring rose, and 6 new cards.
Requires the base game to play.

boardgame.name: Coriolis: Map of the Third Horizon
boardgame.description:
From publisher's website:

A large full-color map of The Third Horizon on the front and the Coriolis station on the back, in the format 480 x 340 mm.

boardgame.name: Solo Camp Pocket
boardgame.description:
Solo Camp Pocket is a small card game where you can enjoy a day and a half of solo camping. There are lots of activities such as using your favorite gear, cooking meals, bonfires and kayaking. Of course there is not enough time to do everything.

The goal of the game is to have the most fun (points) as you can while camping. You only have so much time to camp so you need to make good use of your time. All the while weather can change, accidents can occur, and things can waste away your time.

The game is played by dealing a 3 card hand. Activities require different amounts of time, food, and gear; all of which you must pay for from your hand. For more expensive activities, you can obtain more resources by discarding cards or carrying over cards to the next turn (where you are dealt 3 more cards). You do this until the cards run out, ending the round. 2 more rounds are played and a cumulative score is counted. Try to beat your high score!
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: JUGAME STUDIO (ジュゲムスタジオ)

boardgame.name: Circles
boardgame.description:
Circles features a double-sided game board, with both games being driven by the same game-action mechanism — a player rolling a ball in the felt-covered exterior ring of the track. Place the ball in the right spaces, and you'll make good progress!

On one side of the game board, you dive into the Wild West to mine gold and silver, fight bandits, and fulfill your dream of owning your own ranch. On the other side, you visit the shooting range and try your hand at hitting various targets.

boardgame.name: Witchstone: Full Moon
boardgame.description:
It's full moon in the magical world of Witchstone, and as everyone knows, witches and wizards develop very special powers during a full moon. Their abilities become more powerful, and the potion in their cauldrons even more effective.

The Witchstone: Full Moon expansion includes two expansion modules that can be used individually or together, one of which features new cauldron tiles for better chain reactions; 3D miniatures; and new special cards that among other things let you activate one of two special abilities each turn.

boardgame.name: ヘクサ・ルインス 〜クロコダイルとドレイクの島〜 (Hexa Ruins: The Island of Crocodiles and Drakes -)
boardgame.description:
ヘクサ・ルインス 〜クロコダイルとドレイクの島〜 (Hexa Ruins - The Island of Crocodiles and Drakes -) is a Print & Play expansion to ヘクサ・ルインス (Hexa Ruins). It has two new maps for Hexa Ruins, one with Crocodiles, one with Drakes. The expansion is available as a download purchased from the publisher's online store.
user summary
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: ヘクサ・ルインス (Hexa Ruins)

boardgame.name: 5 Sekund: Dzieci kontra Dorośli
boardgame.description: A totally new game from the famous “5 second rule” series. This time there are questions from children and adults worlds. Parents can play against their kids and check how much they know about their world. Play in teams in order to earn points faster and more effectively.

boardgame.name: Terrible Trouble at Rude River
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

Misunderstanding and betrayal in and around a ramshackle riverside town draw mobs, militias, sailors, scarecrows, bandits, boars, cultists, tax collectors, and the living dead into ever-escalating conflicts. Will the characters defuse the situation in time? Get conscripted, imprisoned, or possessed? Or simply get rich and get out? An open-ended, 5E-compatible roleplaying scenario suitable for characters of 2nd to 4th level.

Includes:

- Unique monsters, magic items, and treasure
- Simple guidelines for running mobs as hazards rather than monsters
- A system for escalating the scenario, complicating the characters' lives, and creating a ticking clock

boardgame.name: Adventure Bar Story
boardgame.description:
Adventure Bar Story is an RPG set in a fantasy world in which you go on adventures with party members and manage a bar.

Your Bar is facing a hostile take over by a rich Restaurant Owner - Gustav. Gustav is a powerful man and he will try to drive you out of business and force you to sell the bar!

Best way to defend the take over? WIN THE CROWD!
Become the most popular bar in town, so even Gustav can't touch you!

Collect mats to make dishes by visiting other towns and dungeons. Levels are gained in this game by eating.

Raise your bar's rank via sales at the bar and by performing well in the cooking contest held at the castle. Work hard to become the top place to eat in the kingdom!

https://adventure-bar-story.fandom.com/wiki/Adventure_Bar_St...

boardgame.name: All for One Dice Pack
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:
Funded as part of the Satan’s Playground Kickstarter campaign, each pack contains ten six-sided dice with three blank faces and three sporting the fleur-de-lys symbol.
boardgame.rpgitemversion: All for One Dice Pack (10 dice)

boardgame.name: Shift Happens
boardgame.description: A co-operative puzzle platformer for two, this bizarre but charming game involves constantly shifting your mass and tossing the other player around to deal with obstacles amidst a futuristic factory.

boardgame.name: Madori-ism
boardgame.description:
Madori-ism is a card game in which cards are stacked and connected to create a floor plan. Place a lot of features you want and erase unnecessary features to aim for the ideal floor plan.

There are two rules included “Design Together” (for 2 to 5 people), where everyone collaborates to make one floor plan, and "Design Apart" (for 1 to 5 people), where each person makes their own floor plan. At the start of the game in both rules, you are given an entryway card that shows you a main objective and a side objective (only used in “Design Apart”) which are your main scoring criteria. These objectives are hidden from the rest of the players.

Design Together: One entryway is placed in the center and you take turns choosing from 3 floor plan cards to add on to the group floor plan. Your goal is to have as many of your main objective fixtures as possible.

Design Apart: Each player creates their own personal floor plan by taking turns choosing a card, with main objective fixtures being worth 1 VP. The side objectives, windows, and variety of fixtures are used to round out the scoring.

boardgame.name: 80's Rewind
boardgame.description:
Did you love the 80's? Think you know more than your radical significant other?

Compete in this custom made game for 2 to find out!

Full of laughs and surprises along the way!

Great to surprise your partner with, great gifts for anniversaries, birthdays, showers, holidays, or just because a hard working couple deserves some fun!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Knights & Legends Advanced Rulebook and Bestiary for Dark Ink 3E
boardgame.description:
Do Not Upload Images




The publisher of this item has asked that no images of any media be uploaded, including representative images. Thank you for your cooperation.




Publisher's blurb:

Bestselling Tabletop RPG Series - Knights & Legends Advanced Rulebook and Bestiary for Dark Ink 3E

boardgame.name: Mythic Magazine (Volume 13 - Dec 2021)
boardgame.description:
User summary:

Content:

Interrupt: Adapting Mythic’s Ranks Rules
Variations: Creature Crafter Simplified

boardgame.name: CryptoSpaceGame
boardgame.description:
CRYPTOSPACEGAME lets you control an intrepid team of crypto currency miners who want to reach the world of their dreams within a year of in-game time. Can you make those dreams come true? Follow the crypto currency exchange rates, devise a clever strategy for money transfer, and multiply your riches. Win the top spot in the race to a life of luxury!

CRYPTOSPACEGAME is a peaceful game, and you will not have to attack your partners. However, you will have to obtain more crypto currency than others and get the most expensive dreams before anyone else does. Think hard, and with a little luck, you may win!

CRYPTOSPACEGAME is a game about the world of cryptocurrency, but you need no background knowledge or preparation to play it.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Bureau of Investigation: Enquêtes à Arkham & Autres Contrées
Bureau of Investigation: Investigations in Arkham & Elsewhere
boardgame.description:
Take a trip to the US in the 1920s and tear the veil concealing the unspeakable threats from Elsewhere.

As agents working for the Bureau of Investigation, you’re tasked with investigating paranormal cases inspired by H.P Lovecraft’s writings.

Explore Boston, Arkham and exotic lands! Follow leads, question witnesses, find clues and take action to solve these five brand new and strange cases.

This is a cooperative and standalone game based on the Sherlock Holmes Consulting detective system, with some twists and new mechanics.

boardgame.name: マッドネスアワー (Madness Hour)
boardgame.description:
North America, the 1920s. There is an old mansion surrounded by disturbing rumours: “The owner, a wealthy man, was devoted to ancient and blasphemous cult.”, “A decade ago, the inhabitants suddenly vanished.”, “All who entered the mansion disappeared, and the few who returned took their own lives soon after.”… The many strange phenomena that occur here hold a dark fascination attracting experts in mysticism and magic. Then, one day, the mansion is visited by a new group of people: A team of investigators from Miskatonic University. How they will end up only depends on the mysterious girl who will hold their fate in her hands…

Madness Hour is an asymmetrical cooperative game of exploration, based on the Cthulhu Mythos by the works of H. P. Lovecraft. One of the players takes the role of the mysterious girl, while the others play investigators, searching for ancient artefacts and trying to escape from a dangerous mansion. You won’t know whether the girl you will encounter in the mansion is human or something more terrifying. The girl’s intentions will depend on her identity, and she will manipulate and change the course of the investigators and the objects they hold. As they investigate, they will have to try and figure out what she is and what she is not.

The mysterious relics that the investigators find in the mansion will drive them into madness and turn them into something else. The investigation within the dark mansion is a mixture of madness and suspicion, leading to unexpected consequences. Will you be able to unravel the true identity of the mysterious girl who controls your destiny and escape from the mansion – while still being human…?

boardgame.name: A.D.E.L.E.: Alien Module
boardgame.description:
– “Emma, there’s been a breach in the starboard aft hatch. Something has entered the ship.”
– “Can you see what it is?”
– “I cannot, sorry. Whatever it is, it is draining the energy in this sector and expanding quickly. Emma, I think the ship is in danger…”

An alien lifeform has broken into the ship and intends to turn it into its lair. Of course, the crew members have no place in the alien’s plans, except perhaps as food… Only one thing can save them: creating a powerful virus that kills the creature, along with all its creations. The chances are slim and the creature get stronger and stronger with time. But they have one thing in their favor: this time, ADELE is on their side.

This Kickstarter-exclusive expansion presents a whole new scenario to use along with ADELE base game. A new set of pieces helps track the progress of the alien player while a new set of objects help the crew members face this new threat.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Organizations: Board Games Association of Creators in Spain (LUDO)

boardgame.name: Sherlock Holmes Le Grand Quiz
boardgame.description:
A Board game and Quiz game all in one. Each team of players/individuals choosing a playing piece, and rolls a dice to determine direction to move on the board. Then a question is answered from 2 choices depending on what space you land on.
The questions are either about Sherlock Holmes or Arthur Conan Doyle.
Game continues until one team or player collects all clue 6 cards i.e. weapon, footprint, pipe, magnifying glass, hourglass to win.

boardgame.name: Arsene Lupin contre Sherlock Holmes
boardgame.description:
You have been recruited by Arsène Lupin to participate with your friends in three major burglaries: find the treasure of the abbeys, take possession of the fortune of the kings of France and steal the blue diamond from the crown! But beware! Because, among the burglars, a surprise guest has managed to infiltrate: Sherlock Holmes, master of disguise, has integrated the band around the nose and beard of the great Arsène Lupin.

In addition to solving the enigmas which stand on the path of your burglaries, you will also have to identify Holmes, and his friend Watson, before he sabotages your plan. Will you manage to thwart the artifices and pierce the disguises of each other to identify who, among you, embodies Sherlock Holmes, or Watson or even the champion of dissimulation, the great Arsène Lupin in person?

Read the murder mystery, collect the clues, use decoder with cards to determine the crime, and if Arsene got away with it or Sherlock caught him.
Player or team wins when crime is revealed. If neither team guesses correctly play continues until all is revealed and one team claims victory.

—user summary

boardgame.name: The Code Agency Sonderermittlung Krimispiel Fall 2: Das Verschwinden des Gary Sander
boardgame.description:
At first glance, Kitzheim looks like a dreamy, inconspicuous place, whose small alleys wind through the tranquil old town. The idyll would be perfect if the small town weren't for the headquarters of the pharmaceutical giant Sander Chemicals, whose boss suddenly mysteriously disappears. The group is looking for answers.

In this thrilling crime thriller, investigate the background of a missing man and explore a small town where no one is entirely innocent.
boardgame.boardgameintegration: The Code Agency Sonderermittlung Krimispiel Fall 1: Flammen im Theater
The Code Agency Sonderermittlung Krimispiel Fall 1: Flammen im Theater

I ship worldwide. For shipping I use DHL for bigger parcels and Deutsche Post for parcels below 1kg or 0,5kg. Worldwide shipping prices for parcels below 2kg are very reasonable especially below 1kg. Please drop me a geekmail if you want to know the shipping cost to your country.
Money transfer fees are on the buyer

boardgame.name: North Pole to Manhattan: The Elf Game
boardgame.description:
Roll and move Buddy the Elf from the North Pole to Manhattan. Make sure to spread Christmas cheer and don’t eat the yellow snow!

This game has 2-4 players play as Buddy the elf racing to find their dad in Manhattan. Straight roll and move game with events on the board that may move you forward or backwards (many backwards are -20 spaces). First player to the North Pole wins.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Spuds 'N Goblins
boardgame.description:
A fast-paced, goblin-themed potato-gathering card game. Players play from three decks: Goblins, potatoes, and events. Players draw a goblin and a potato card on their turns, and may play add a goblin card to the field. Use your goblin's powers during your (or your opponent's!) turn to snag potato cards or do battle with enemy goblins. The player who gathers the most potatoes before winter hits wins! The game ends when all potatoes are gone. Will you thrive or starve?

—description from the back of the box (edited)

boardgame.name: アニマルコレクティング (Animal Collecting)
boardgame.description:
アニマルコレクティング (Animal Collecting) is a card game from Japan. The deck allows two games to be played: Hide & Seek, and Rebellion.

The players are zoo keepers and must sort the zoo out. For the game Hide & Seek, they swap cards in the style of Old Maid and try to complete sets of animals. Or they can guess the missing animal, a card drawn face-down to the table at the start of the game. However, there is also a black cat card, which a player may pass as an alternate to the requested card.

In the game Rebellion, one player is unhappy with the zoo's policies and is disrupting the zoo by hidden different animals in different places. In a one vs many game, the other three players must deduce where the animals are hidden.
user summary
boardgame.boardgamegraphicdesigner: Konkinme Works (コキンメワークス)
boardgame.boardgamedesigner: Kosuke Zaitsu (ザイツ コウスケ)

boardgame.name: Star Trek: The Next Generation Collectible Dice Game – Borg Sphere Booster Set #2
boardgame.description:
Star Trek: The Next Generation Collectible Dice Game – Borg Sphere Starter.
Contains:
2xd12 Weapon Beam dice (front/starboard & front port)
8xd12 Weapon Beam dice (2 each front/starboard, front/port, aft/starboard, & aft/port)

Each booster set contains 10 new dice to expand your ship and rulebook with rules for multiplayer battles and explaining new dice effects.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Star Trek: The Next Generation Collectible Dice Game
Star Trek: The Next Generation Collectible Dice Game – Borg Sphere Starter Set

boardgame.name: Banana wa o yatsu ni hairimasu ka?
バナナはおやつに入りますか？(Do Bananas Count As A Snack?)
boardgame.description:
バナナはおやつに入りますか？ (Banana wa o yatsu ni hairimasu ka?) is a card game from Japan, in which players must face a philosophical dilemma that has tormented humanity since the dawn of time. Do bananas count as a snack food?

In this game, the players are elemnetary school children, buying snacks to take on their school trip. They have some money and a variety of snacks choices in the shop. As well the usual chocolate bars, sweets and corn snacks, there are bananas. They must use their money wisely, and buy good value snacks, and not have too much change left over.

If a player buys some bananas, will they count as positive or negative points at the end of the game? It depends on the other children. If several children buy bananas, they count as 2 pts. But in not enough buy bananas, they count as -1 pt. Players must balance their need to spend, against the risk of elementary school childrens' opinions on bananas as snack food.
user summary
boardgame.boardgamedesigner: Kosuke Zaitsu (ザイツ コウスケ)

boardgame.name: ioGioco (Issue 20 - Mar 2021)
boardgame.description:
Issue #20 of ioGioco includes a lot of material related to Dante Alighieri:

Biscazzando con l'Alighieri, by Andrea Angiolino
Games played by Dante, games about Dante

Questo Dante, per lo suo savere, fue alquanto presuntuoso, by Fabio Gambiaghi
What kind of gamers would you find in each of Dante's nine circles of hell? And what games?

Giocare sulle orme del Sommo Poeta, by Ivano Franzini

Durante degli Aligeri
Dante as a NPC for the Brancalonia RPG

This issue included a free deck of KeyForge: Age of Ascension.

boardgame.name: The Warlock Returns - Issue #05 (Q3-4/21)
boardgame.description:
From the back of the magazine

This issue brings you new material for fans of the Advanced Fighting Fantasy Roleplaying game and the Fighting Fantasy gamebooks.
Published four times a year, this issue contains:


Denizens of the Pit - More of Titan's island creatures
Jungle - Magic within the jungles of Titan
Warlock! Deep-Dive - A look at the AFF inspired roleplay game
Sorcerer Spell Cards - For use with your magic users
Director advice articles suggesting rumours and plot hooks
Everyone-Games - An online accessibility-driven RPG convention
New Races: Lizards and the Cat People
The Legend of Gareus comic strip and agony aunt page
Torra: Bringing Down the House - Draws to a conclusion
The Lindenbaum Prize for Short Gamebook Fiction
Plus further information on the Warlock Returns charity auction


[Note: There are only three issues in 2021]
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: Stellar Adventures: Torra: Bringing Down the House

boardgame.name: Legends of Hellas
boardgame.description:
Legends of Hellas is a co-operative game in which players act as heroes trying to defeat mythological monsters. Unlike many other cooperative games, players cannot see each other’s cards. On top, they are not allowed to communicate with each other to provide hints about the cards they hold. Over the course of 1 to 12 missions, between 1 and 5 players will fight a series of terrifying monsters. Each mission requires the player(s) to defeat 7 monsters without running out of cards; their fate is in your hands!

On their turn, a player must select and perform one of the following 5 actions:

Fight - Play one of your action cards face-up next to the monster card on which your hero disc is located.

Move - Whenever you move your hero disc from one monster card to another, you must discard 1 action card from your hand.

Recover - Draw action cards from the draw pile, so that you hold up to 5 action cards in your hand. No matter how many cards you draw, you must then discard a card from your hand, face-down.

Support - Give one or more cards from your hand to a fellow player. The receiving player must then discard at least 1 card from their hand to the discard pile, face-down.

Consult the Oracle - Draw the top 6 action cards from the deck and place them face-up on the table. Choose and discard one of those cards. Then return the remaining 5 cards to the top of the deck in any order of your choosing.

A mission is won when the last Chimera is defeated. However, if a player ever holds no action cards in their hand AND has to draw from the depleted draw pile, the mission is lost. On the other hand, if the draw pile is depleted but the players can still take turns with the cards in their hands, the mission may still be won.

-description from publisher
